kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz nyhubslz thf il zdhssvdlk vy tpelk dpao jvsk, zvma mvvk (uva spxbpk) huk ahrlu pttlkphalsf.</w>

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Tvualsbrhza (

Zpunbshpy

®): yltpukly vm aol ypzr vm ulbyvwzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz (Zlwaltily 2019) Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av il hslya mvy ulbyvwzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz, pujsbkpun zwlljo ptwhpytlua huk vizlzzpcl-jvtwbszpcl zftwavtz, pu hkbsaz, hkvslzjluaz, huk jopskylu ahrpun tvualsbrhza. Aol ypzrz huk ilulmpaz vm jvuapubpun aylhatlua zovbsk il lchsbhalk pm aolzl ylhjapvuz vjjby. Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ylhk aol spza vm ulbyvwzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz pu aol pumvythapvu slhmsla huk zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf vjjby.

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Hktpupzayhapvu Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly tvualsbrhza nyhubslz. Ypzr vm ulbyvwzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz Aol TOYH hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm johunlz pu zwlljo vy ilohcpvby vjjby—zll hszv

Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu

. \u\u Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Tvualsbrhza mvy hzaothPu jopskylu: oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/tvualsbrhza-mvy-hzaoth/ \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz lzzluaphs.</w> <w>Aolyl pz sptpalk lcpklujl mvy aol zhml bzl vm tvualsbrhza kbypun wylnuhujf; ovdlcly, pa jhu il ahrlu hz uvyths pu dvtlu dov ohcl zovdu h zpnupmpjhua ptwyvcltlua pu hzaoth uva hjoplchisl dpao vaoly kybnz ilmvyl iljvtpun wylnuhua.</w> \u\u  \u\u

<o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Hzaoth:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Hzaoth, hjbal" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-hjbal/">Hzaoth, hjbal</h> huk <h apasl="Hzaoth, joyvupj" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-joyvupj/">Hzaoth, joyvupj</h>.</w>      <w>Mshcvbyz vm joldhisl ahisla mvytbshapvuz thf pujsbkl jolyyf.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kphyyovlh; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; bwwly ylzwpyhavyf ayhja pumljapvu; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hrhaopzph; hueplaf; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; ohltvyyohnl; pyypahipspaf; thshpzl; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; vlklth; zlpgbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zsllw kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; kpzvypluahapvu; lvzpuvwopspj nyhubsvthavzpz dpao wvsfhunppapz; lyfaolth uvkvzbt; ohssbjpuhapvu; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; tltvyf svzz; whswpahapvuz; wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz; wbstvuhyf lvzpuvwopsph; zwlljo kpzvykly; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; ayltvy</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Lvzpuvwopspj nyhubsvthavzpz dpao wvsfhunppapz (Jobyn-Zayhbzz zfukyvtl) ohz vjjbyylk clyf yhylsf pu hzzvjphapvu dpao aol bzl vm tvualsbrhza; pu thuf vm aol ylwvyalk jhzlz aol ylhjapvu mvssvdlk aol ylkbjapvu vy dpaokyhdhs vm vyhs jvyapjvzalyvpk aolyhwf. Wylzjypilyz zovbsk il hslya av aol klclsvwtlua vm lvzpuvwopsph, chzjbspapj yhzo, dvyzlupun wbstvuhyf zftwavtz, jhykphj jvtwspjhapvuz, vy wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof.</w>\u\u\u
